Trade/Device Name(s): Healgen Amphetamine Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Healgen Cocaine Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Healgen Methamphetamine Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Healgen immunochromatographic lateral flow tests for qualitative detection of amphetamine, cocaine (benzoylecgonine), and methamphetamine in urine using strip, cassette, cup, and dip card formats.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of amphetamine, benzoylecgonine, or methamphetamine in human urine at specified cut-off concentrations as preliminary tests, available in strip, cassette, dip card, and cup formats for prescription and over-the-counter in vitro diagnostic use.
